titleStmt.title: The tryal of Laurence Braddon and Hugh Speke, gent., upon an information of high-misdemeanor, subornation, and spreading false reports endeavouring thereby to raise a belief in His Majesties subjects that the late Earl of Essex did not murther himself in the Tower ... / before Sir George Jeffreys.
titleStmt.author: Braddon, Laurence, d. 1724.
Speke, Hugh, 1656-1724?
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
